title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
**Introducing The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle**

Get ready to cozy up with the warmth and comfort of our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring two delicious and caffeine-free herbal teas: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple. This exclusive bundle is perfect for the harvest season and makes a wonderful dessert tea.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**

Indulge in the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves with our naturally-caffeine free Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea. This soothing blend is made with a combination of apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, and other natural ingredients to create a deliciously warm and spicy tea.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**

Treat yourself to the sweet and tangy flavors of our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, featuring South African Rooibos as its base. This caffeine-free tea combines the natural sweetness of apples with the richness of vanilla and caramel flavors, making it a delightful treat any time of day.

**Steeping Instructions**

To brew the perfect cup, simply steep one tea bag in 6 oz of boiling water for 5-7 minutes. And, as an added bonus, you can compost or reuse the tea bags to reduce waste and nourish your soil.

**Bundle Details**

This limited-edition bundle includes 36 tea bags of each flavor, making it the perfect gift for friends and family or a special treat for yourself.
